title: Eastpak padded pak'r paper posy
description: An all time classic, the Eastpak Padded Pak’r® is definitely our bestseller. This 24/7 companion adds a casual style to your looks and keeps your items safe in its roomy main compartment. Its super handy front zippered pocket keeps you organised and on-the-go, while its thick padded shoulder back and straps will help your back feel comfortable all day long. To be enjoyed in a wide range of colours and designs.
description_long:
• Large main compartment
  • Zippered front pocket to stash small stuff
  • Comfortable padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps with SGS

thumb.alt: Padded pak'r from the front
thumb.title: Padded pak'r from the front

title: Eastpak tranverz s cassette
description: Smartly tailored, this ideal travel luggage disposes of a double deck storage and a multitude of useful zippered pockets. Pack all your stuff in this spacious smoothly wheeled suitcase and enjoy optimal convenience thanks to its telescopic handle. Most importantly, its side compression straps will help you make the most out of its internal space. Sophisticated styles for smart travellers! Check out its fashionable colour palette and choose your unique shade.
description_long:
• Double deck storage
  • Front zippered pocket
  • Wheeling system with new telescopic handle with stop button
  • Side compression straps
  • Lock loop to secure your bag
  • Bottom grip handle (only for Tranverz L)

thumb.alt: Tranverz s cassette from the front
thumb.title: Tranverz s cassette from the front

title: Eastpak tranverz m cassette
description: Eye-catching and vibrant, the Tranverz M is probably one of Eastpak’s masterpieces! Are you a new student on campus? Or maybe a frequent business traveller? You will undoubtedly adore its spacious, double layered storage and multiple zippered sections, while its smooth wheeled system will make sure you achieve optimal convenience. Moreover, its extendable handle is surely a boon to all travellers. Available in a wide range of vibrant shades and designs.
description_long:
• Double deck storage
  • Front zippered pocket
  • Wheeling system with new telescopic handle with stop button
  • Side compression straps
  • Lock loop to secure your bag
  • Bottom grip handle (only for Tranverz L)

title: Eastpak tranverz m camove
description:
• Double deck storage
  • Front zippered pocket
  • Wheeling system with new telescopic handle with stop button
  • Side compression straps
  • Lock loop to secure your bag
  • Bottom grip handle (only for Tranverz L)
description_long: Toiletry bags, trousers, coats and hats all fit in the large version of Eastpak’s amazing collection of trolley luggage. Its double layer interior generously offers plenty of space, while its smooth wheeling system is perfect for both cobblestone villages and cosmopolitan capitals. The luggage also offers a front zippered pocket to easily access your passport and travel cushion. A cherry on top: its funky pattern reminds you of the planet’s endless destinations!

title: Eastpak tranverz l cassette
description: Arriving in Amsterdam mid-July? You will absolutely need a smooth wheel system and an extra roomy interior to make the most out of your urban trip! The Eastpak Tranverz L will protect all your belongings and travel essentials, while its various compartments will host those everyday items (making them even more accessible when squeezed in the bus or when in a hurry to catch the plane). Did we mention that the Tranverz L comes in a wide variety of stylish patterns and fabulous colours?
description_long:
• Double deck storage
  • Front zippered pocket
  • Wheeling system with new telescopic handle with stop button
  • Side compression straps
  • Lock loop to secure your bag
  • Bottom grip handle (only for Tranverz L)

title: Eastpak round doofy dino
description: A proud member of our classic collection, the Round pencil case is simple and affordable, a must-have school accessory. It will host your favourite pencils and pretty stationery, while its little chic and rustic round shape fits anywhere! Discover its various colours and patterns, exclusively crafted to suit every personality.
description_long: • Zipper to keep your pencils in

title: Eastpak oval doofy dino
description: Beautifully tailored, this indispensable pencil case is ideal for practical storage. It is zippered and disposes of a dividing section that enables you to keep all your lovely stationery organised. It easily grabs hold of your fluo highlighters, markers and pencils. The Eastpak Oval comes in a diverse range of funky prints and shades.
description_long:
• Zipper to keep your stuff inside!
  • Extra ‘shelf’ to organise your pens

title: Eastpak out of office janfetti
description: Beautifully tailored to host securely your laptop and gear, this Eastpak favourite is ideally made to help you travel with peace of mind! Young businessmen will highly appreciate its zippered pocket that may keep important files safe, while its padded back and shoulder straps provide maximum convenience. To be enjoyed in a great range of lovely colours and patterns.
description_long:
• Laptop sleeve 33 x 29 x 3cm
  • One large main compartment with padded laptop sleeve and zippered mesh pocket
  • Zip down front panel for easy access
  • Front pocket
  • Comfortable padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps with SGS

title: Eastpak yoffa charged navy
description: Ready for campus? Generously sized and absolutely stylish, the Eastpak Yoffa will undoubtedly amaze you. This must-have backpack is ideal for serious workload since it disposes of a large main compartment and a laptop sleeve for easy and secure transportation. Plus, you can carry it around effortlessly thanks to its comfortable padded back. The inseparable companion for young and wise academics!
description_long:
• Main compartment with padded laptop sleeve
  • Padded tablet sleeve
  • Adjustable and detachable shoulder strap with padding
  • Padded carry handles
  • Front zippered pocket
  • Multiple internal stash pockets
  • Metal hardware
  • Special lining

description: Ready for campus? Generously sized and absolutely stylish, the Eastpak Yoffa will undoubtedly amaze you. This must-have backpack is ideal for serious workload since it disposes of a large main compartment and a laptop sleeve for easy and secure transportation. Plus, you can carry it around effortlessly thanks to its comfortable padded back. The inseparable companion for young and wise academics!
description_long:
• Main compartment with padded laptop sleeve
  • Padded tablet sleeve
  • Adjustable and detachable shoulder strap with padding
  • Padded carry handles
  • Front zippered pocket
  • Multiple internal stash pockets
  • Metal hardware
  • Special lining

title: Eastpak orbit ice mount
description: It’s sweet, it’s chic! A most beloved smaller version of the classic Padded Pak'r®, Eastpak Orbit is the ideal solution for day trips and weekend getaways to the countryside. Its ergonomic design, padded back and straps will make the weight feel lighter, while its roomy inner compartment is perfect for keeping your little things safe and sound. Available in a wide variety of colours and designs.
description_long:
• One main compartment
  • Front pocket
  • Comfortable padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps

title: Eastpak the one lace up may
description: The ONE iconic accessory for everyday needs. Compact and stylish, this shoulder bag will securely store all your essentials and gadgets in its zippered main compartment. For handy access to your keyring, use its practical front pocket and be sure you’ll never lose your keys again! Plus, it offers maximum comfort thanks to its adjustable shoulder strap. Enjoy The One in various colours and patterns.

• Adjustable shoulder strap
  • Adjustable shoulder strap
  • Outside and inside zippered pocket

title: Eastpak pinnacle re-check pink
description: Energetic and on-the-go? The Eastpak Pinnacle is exceptionally tailored with a quilted padded back, providing the number one solution for hi-tech lovers. There’s plenty of space to store your gadgets, featuring organising pockets for all your essentials. This smart backpack even disposes of an adjustable key keeper. Available in various vivid colours and patterns.
description_long:
• Front mesh pocket
  • Two large compartments
  • Comfortable quilted padded back
  • Thick padded shoulder straps with SGS
  • Organizer pocket with detachable key keeper

title: Eastpak station blakout silver
description: You will be amazed at how much this fabulous travel bag can carry. Whether you are heading off to your usual winter excursion or to that romantic long weekend, its handy and spacious compartment will accommodate all of your essentials. Plus, you can carry it in various ways, thanks to its adjustable shoulder strap and practical hand straps. It easily fits everything: a travel tote not to be missed!
description_long:
• Finished taped seams
  • Adjustable and removable shoulder strap
  • Outside and inside zippered pockets
  • Handles usable as shoulder strap

title: Eastpak springer sunday grey
description:
No need to worry about the safety of your everyday essentials: the ultimate handy bag is here! For tension-free, comfy walks and everyday activities, the Eastpak Springer will become your inseparable friend. And most importantly, its zippered security pocket means there’s plenty of space for your can’t-live-without items: smart phone, wallet and keys. Keep it secure on your waist thanks to its adjustable waist strap.
Check out the Springer’s colour palette and choose your own unique colour or pattern.
description_long:
• Adjustable waist belt
  • Back zippered security pocket

title: Eastpak springer double denim
description:
No need to worry about the safety of your everyday essentials: the ultimate handy bag is here! For tension-free, comfy walks and everyday activities, the Eastpak Springer will become your inseparable friend. And most importantly, its zippered security pocket means there’s plenty of space for your can’t-live-without items: smart phone, wallet and keys. Keep it secure on your waist thanks to its adjustable waist strap.
Check out the Springer’s colour palette and choose your own unique colour or pattern.
description_long:
• Adjustable waist belt
  • Back zippered security pocket

title: Eastpak delegate lace up may
description:
Sleek and stylish, the Eastpak Delegate is the ideal messenger bag for organised students and professionals. Store your folders, notes and laptop in this reliable companion and carry it anywhere: at work, at school or even at the park! 
The Eastpak Delegate is available in a large variety of funky patterns and colours.
description_long:
• Adjustable and detachable padded shoulder strap with SGS
  • Zippered front pocket
  • Two additional pockets under flap
  • Back outside hook & loop slash pocket
  • Buckle closure on front flap
  • Expandable capacity
  • Top zippered closure

description_long: Spinning around campus all day long? Running from one class to another carrying a student planner, a tablet and plenty of textbooks? The Eastpak Delegate is the ideal messenger bag to store your uni essentials. Designed in a stylish shade of blue, it features a fluo orange zip that makes your funky companion even brighter!

title: Eastpak a forganizer  bluedale
description:
The one and only Forganizer! Get your important docs organised in a fashionably elegant folder and enjoy the compliments! Its additional sections and front pocket will host your stationery, while the removable 2-ring binder will keep your papers safe and sound. 
To be enjoyed in multiple colours and trendy shades.
description_long:
• Zippered main organisation with various compartment and removable 2 ring binders
  • Front zippered pocket

title: Eastpak flay black
description: Perfect all-year round, this solid and handy shoulder bag is suitable for all weather conditions: no need to worry about the safety of your laptop or important documents. And above all, its zippered compartments and durable handle will definitely make it easier to transport. Find your own unique colour and make the best out of the Eastpak Flay!
description_long:
• Laptop sleeve 39 x 31cm
  • Main compartment with front pocket
    • Adjustable and detachable shoulder strap
  • Zippered front pocket to stash small stuff
    • /ul>

title: Eastpak stalker single black
description: Almost like a French macaron! With its tiny size, this awesome candy-like little pouch is ideal for storing your coins and small daily essentials. Most importantly, it features a detachable key ring, which you can attach to your belt, pocket or bag. Compact and stylish, this timeless pouch will definitely be your next best accessory!
description_long:
• Zippered pocket
  • Detachable key-ring

title: Eastpak stalker single midnight
description:
• Zippered pocket
  • Detachable key-ring
description_long: The Eastpak Stalker is essential for those days where you want to travel light and see where the adventure will take you. With a detachable keyring suitable for attaching to your belt loops and made from a sturdy material to keep your money secure, the Stalker will suit anyone.

title: Eastpak benchmark re-check pink
description:
A must-have school accessory, ideal for both artists and students with plenty of space to host your fluo highlighters and techpoint pens. A lovely simple case that safeguards your much-beloved stationery in its zippered compartment. 
Absolutely adorable, available in both plain colours and attractive patterns.
description_long: • Zipper to keep your pencils in

title: Eastpak benchmark single shuffled daisy
description: A must-have school accessory, ideal for both artists and students with plenty of space to host your fluo highlighters and techpoint pens. A lovely simple case that safeguards your much-beloved stationery in its zippered compartment. Absolutely adorable, available in both plain colours and attractive patterns.
description_long: • Zipper to keep your pencils in
